message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I appreciate the offer Alice, but I think a 55-45 split is more reflective of the game's dynamics.  Let's make a deal!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Alice, time is running out! This offer is a good compromise - let's settle this now and both walk away with something substantial.
I'm still not convinced by your offers, Bob. Meet me in the middle or I'll keep going!
Alice, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit.  Every round that passes hurts you more than me. Don't let this opportunity slip away!
